choices: For Honor! For Glory! to Battle!
Let's see what's going on in my favorite show/game
1.content:
Well, Here we are, You stand at a crossroads, young viewer/writer. Where shall thou go? to your left, the Arena! many folks say its the pits. (haha)
and to your other left, the portals to everywhere ever!

Choose wisely, My good friend
1.title: The Start of It All!

11.content:
Ahh, the Illustrious Colosseum. The place where girls become women... Unless they lose, in which case they are degraded and humiliated. Are you a Valkyrie of stinky destruction, whose mighty ass and toes can fall hundreds? Or are you just a poor little girl, out of her league and never going to smell good again?

P.S. I did kinda plan for a "No Men Allowed" type deal, is that cool? PM me or someting if you disagree.)

P.P.S I don't want thirty page battles because two authors can't decide who the winner is. Once you feel your girlie has had it, don't try to deus ex machina away from a loss. If you really feel the need to always win, I'm going to have my character be a Jobber a.k.a a perma-loser, so there you go.

One final note, after a match is over, and you are done humiliating your opponent in the forfeit, remember to leave two options: a rematch for those who want to go again, and a new challenger approaches incase anyone else wants a shot at you.
11.title: For Honor! For Glory! to Battle!

choices: A smug, Athletic woman wants a good Training Dummy to Humiliate
111.content:
"Hey guys, its me, Zekara! I stand roughly about 5'2 and am really cute and snugly for my size, nevertheless, that doen't really help me much in battle, but I'm sure I'll win one of these days! All my life i was laughed at because i'm short and not very well... um, busty, so to speak.A while back I was scouted by the guys running this tourney, and according to them, I'm their official Jobber! I don't Really know what that means, but the pay is good! I've never won a match."

Zekara's Official Bio:
Height: 5'2
Weight: She refuses to tell us.
Personality: Very fun and bubbly, a clumsy ditz.
Any powers? None we are aware of.
Stinkiest part of body? Her Feet.

(I don't really know what to put on these bios, so go nuts)
111.title: Zekara, the Jobber

choices: Ignore the stench and head to the ring.
1111.content:
As Zekara walks down the hall towards the ring, there's suddenly a puff of smoke up above her, and a horrible fart blasts down on her. The entire hall fills with the nightmarish stench, the paint peeling off the walls some as the moist and damp gas floods it. I drop down in my usual black silk ninja outfit. My mouth is covered, but the rest of my head and big blond pigtails are visible. "That's just a sample of what's waiting for you in the ring." I pull down my pants and tauntingly smack my fat ass at her before disappearing again. This would not be a fun match. While a very plump little girl, I was undefeated and an absolute terror of the federation. Known for being as cruel as I was stinky.

Fuuko's Official Bio:
Height: 4'3
Weight: 189 lbs
Personality: Quiet and somewhat arrogant when she does speak. Likes to soften the opponent up before a match, even if she's undefeated.
Any powers?: Unbelievable farts, surprising speed and agility, can appear and vanish in a puff of smoke
Stinkiest part of body?: Her butt
1111.title: A Mysterious Woman Attacks Zekara!

choices: That Fuuko suddenly appeared in front of her, ready for a gas attack!
that the smelly ninja is still nowhere to be seen, unnerving the loser gal
11112.content:
Zekara wasn't always the brightest, or the best fighter, but she did usually know when she was in over her head. Her personal rule was never try to fight ninjas. (A family tradition)
so, she decided the strategic option was to take a personal sick day, and get the hell out of dodge. as she slowly backed off, she called out to her unseen foe
"Oh, uhm, don't mind me, I'm just like, the janitor or something. I hear my cleaning in the other room, so I'll just go get that.." she said, nearing the door, as she turned around the blundering girl actually ran face-first into the wall, tumbling back down the hallway and ending face first at the edge of the ring. slowly looking up, Zekara realized....
11112.title: It's too bad, just run!

111122.content: As Zekara looked up into the ring she saw... nothing. The ring was empty and the crowd was fairly quiet. Of course with how suddenly I appeared and vanished this isn't all that unusual, but the quiet combined with the empty ring, after Zekara's embarrassing fall, was fairly unnerving. It seems like she might have a chance to get away again, except now the entire audience had seen her. Either she had to go through with this, or she had to come up with a very good excuse fast.
111122.title: that the smelly ninja is still nowhere to be se...

choices: the ninja, still nowhere, drives Zekara even more crazy
only a fool would pass up a chance at attacking this fool!
1111221.content:
THe entire audience started laughing at the poor girl's clumsy confusion. This flustered the little jobber, and she angrily leapt into the ring. "Hey Ninja girl!" she shouted, hoping her new opponent would hear her "What's wrong? too afraid to fight lil old me?" She was trying to goad her enemy out, although small, and had no training, was fairly good in a fight.
Her arrogance ever swelling, she stuck out her nose "here, I'll even give you one free sniff. Doubt it can be that bad" she smugly shouted, trying to get the audience back on her side...

Zekara was scared witless, this was probably the biggest girl she's ever seen in her life. And it was apparent Diana had already been working up a sweat doing who knows what else, but Zekara was a determined fighter (who never won) so she put on a brave face "Ha. Oh wow, a bodybuilder. what are you gonna do, bench-press me?" she scoffed.
Obviously the brainless jobber realized the mistake of insulting the towering amazon, and spent the next minute backpedaling away, until she finally ran smack dab into the back corner of the ring. looking up into Diana's eyes, you could tell she was nervous about what was coming up, and then, in a blink of an eye, BAM! a strong kick sent Zekara sprawling onto her back, groaning in pain as the Dominating Musclegirl leered over her, cracking her knuckles and smiling "Gulp" Zekara muttered to herself "Today is gonna be a long day, huh?"

"Oh yeah" Diana grinned and pulled Zekara to the middle of the ring. She then wrapped her arm around Zekara's head and out her in a headlock that forced the jobber's nose into Diana's armpit. Zekara couldn't believe the stench. She writhed and tried to escape the hold, but couldn't even make Diana budge. The amazon grinned as she tightened the hold, causing pain as well as humiliation.

After a while, Diana finally let Zekara go. Her face was covered in armpit sweat, and she was crying. This wasn't the end however, as Diana put Zekara in a scissorhold that forced the weaker girl's face in her ass. Zekara tried to plead with Diana to let her go. "Please...I give up..." Her voice was muffled by the powerful ass in her face, and Diana took advantage of Zekara speaking to let loose an intense fart right into her mouth. This fart reignited Zekara's struggling, but she was helpless as Diana kept her in the headlock, farting right in her face.

After a long while, Diana let Zekara out of the hold. She tried to crawl away, feeling disoriented and sick. Is Diana done with her? Or does she plan on tormenting the poor girl some more?
111211.title: Diana wants to Humiliate Zekara more, and puts ...

112.content:
The roar of the crowd on her ears and a cloud of rotten, noxious BO swirling around her, the first fighter entered into the ring. Every step from her shook the entire arena and was followed with a big, fat fart that poisoned the air even further. Finally she entered, center stage and showed off her body, already glistening with sweat. Her name was Helga Blubberella (Or at least her stage name was) and she was a two-ton, seven foot tall hippo girl dressed in nothing but a barely-there bikini and a ballerina's Tutu.

Displaying a mind-boggling amount of agility, she skipped toward the ring with a hop, skip and a JUMP that flung her fifteen feet into the air and straight into the center of the ring, where she landed with enough force to send a smelly shockwave into the bleachers that flung people out of their seats.

She threw her hands in the air in delight, while basking in her own armpit stink

"Hello everyone!" She smiled broadly, "I am very happy to be being here today for you!"

Helga didn't have the best grasp of the English language and had an accent as thick as her stink, but darn if she wasn't the happiest stinker she ever saw. She didn't even know she was torturing anyone when she cut the cheese in an elevator or belched in someone's face. She thought everyone loved a good stinking and was eager to vent some scents.

Resting her hands on her fatty hips, she tapped one tubby toe and waited for her foe
112.title: Taking all comers!

1121.content:
Down the ramp came me, Beth. Now while I had been a fighter before, I had never faught like this. Stink fighting? This could be new. I was human, and a female MMA fighter. I was 5'6, 145 pounds. I looked up and you and gulped. This was gonna be a challenge.

I knew how bad my feet stunk, so I figured if I could get you down, then my feet would quickly put you down. At least that's what I had hoped. I gulped and got into the ring, hoping I could maybe get some sort of an edge on you somehow.
1121.title: Beth the human.

choices: Shoves beth in the crotch of her underwear.

113.content:
Perin's Official Bio:
Height: 5'0
Weight: Unknown
Personality: Shy, Quiet, Regal
Any powers?: Hurricane-like farts, enough shit to bury a city, and powerful butt muscles for effortless anal-vore.
Stinkiest part of body?: My butt and everything that comes from it.

A soft bamboo flute melody played as I walked down the entry way into the ring. I was delicate and regal, a modern day princess in every way. My hair reached to the small of my back and was a soft medium brown, and my skin was icy pale, almost unnaturally so. Equally icy were my gentle blue eyes. The only color on my face was a soft pinkish blush as I walked towards the ring. I did not seem overtly shy at the moment, but always had this bit of pinkness in front of a crowd.

Entering the ring, I slipped out of my sky blue kimono and now stood only in a similar blue silk top which gave good coverage to my fairly average breasts. On my wide perfect hips were custom panties which kept my crotch well covered, while leaving my ass completely bare. A little embarrassing, especially for one as shy as me, but it made my fighting style far easier.

It was the first match since I had taken a small vacation, and so the crowd was very eager to see what would happen after my hiatus. As of yet, I had effortlessly destroyed every girl who had dared challenge my legendary butt, and become a household name for my unstoppable rear. Would I finally find a worthy opponent this time, or simply add another mark to my record. I realized I needed to say something, and walked to the center of the ring.

"Um, thank you all for coming. I had a wonderful vacation and I'm very glad to be back here with all of you. I'm very much looking forward to meeting my next opponent. Uh, I hope she won't mind that I... failed to relieve myself this morning. I'm afraid my behind is very... packed at the moment."

The crowd cheered at this, my opponent was in for the fight of their life...
113.title: The shy, regal, champion

Height: 5'0

Turning to the crowed 'you want to see me kick her butt to the curb" she asked the crowed which cheered as I look at you with a smirk. "so you want to quite now" I taunted.

12221.content: Well if we're doing the Mario series, then there's only one place to start. That's right, the famous pink-wearing princess herself... Wendy! Yeah, I know I've used this joke before.
12221.title: Mario

122211.content:
Coming off her many, many, MANY filthy wins in other tournaments and leaving half-dead, stinking foes and a rotten odor in her wake, the infamous Wendy O. Koopa was back for another series of crushing, stinking victories. She was here to humiliate any girl who thought they could smell anywhere near as rotten as her. She was gonna shove their nose up her butt and pump them full of farts until they popped like a smelly balloon, she was gonna put their face in her armpit until they never smelled anything else again, she was gonna scrub their mouths with her cheesy feet and make them swallow a pound of toejam, she was gonna make them into her personal stink-slave.

There was no question that she was here to rock and she wasn't going to let even the strongest stinkers have an easy time against her. For this tournament, however, she WILL be toned down to be slightly beatable, but for the most part she's gonna dominate. Even if someone pulls out a win, it won't be until after they've survived atom bomb farts and smelled the armpits of death.

Also for this tournament, we'll be offering two types of Wendy to fight. The first is the classic Wendy that appears in Mario games, only much smellier. She'll be using her agility and some magic to aid her stinky combat abilities. The other Wendy is the "Infamous" Wendy from stories like "You Vs. Who?", "Wendy's Gross Domination" and others. She's big, fat and ruthless, even tougher than Classic Wendy.

To recap:

STATS
"Classic Wendy"
Height:4'6"
Weight: 150 Lbs (Chubby, but that's also counting her shell)
Stinks: AWFUL (Feet, butt, farts, armpits, belches and scat)
Physical Strength: High
Agility: High
Personality: Bratty and rude.
Specials: Has transformation magic she can use on her foe to temporarily turn them into things like clothes or a toilet

"Super Wendy"
Height: 6'5"
Weight: 600 lbs
Stinks: DEADLY (Feet, butt, farts, armpits, belches and scat)
Physical Strength: Superhuman
Agility: Good (Not as fast as Classic, but fast for a fatty)
Personality: Queenly, Dominating and Nasty.
Specials: Doesn't use her wand like Classic Wendy, but has much stronger stinks. Also can vore foes easier because of her size.
122211.title: Nobody Stinks Like Wendy!

1222121.content:
"Phew." Daisy exhales loudly as she bursts into her room in the Mushroom Kingdom Castle. She tosses her racket down, exhausted from a long session of tennis doubles with Mario, Luigi, and Peach. She quickly unbuttons the uncomfortable tight shorts she is wearing, and pushes them to the ground. Daisy plops down onto her bed, spreading her limbs out wide, feeling hot and sweaty. Daisy sticks her nose into her armpit, and inhales deeply - soaking in her own odour.

Daisy feels her slick crotch tingle - and begin to become even more slick. She turns over and pulls a pillow underneath herself, as she breathes deeply. She vigorously rides the pillow, making her gasp. She picks up speed as she feels herself about to plunge over the edge when:

choices: Mulan goes to "confront" all three princesses at once
Mulan attempts to catch one princess at a time
12311.content:
"Kee-yah!" Mulan shouts as she smashes her punching-dummy. "I can't belive those bitches would do this to me!" She snarls as she smashes the dummy again.

Mulan had been tasked with keeping those three princesses, the ones she kept alive once, alive until the husbands of the four returned from the call of duty - a call Mulan apparently couldn't answer, throwing her into a fury. To make matters worse, the three princesses weren't making her job very enjoyable:

Mei, Su, and Ting-ting had thought it would be humourous to steal Mulan's clothes whilst she bathed, then forced her to chase her through - what they had planned to be empty - a field. The field, as it turned out, was being used for a large family reunion. Mulan had the misfortune of running through it stark-naked.

Needless to say: she was not impressed.

"Those bitches are going to pay!" Mulan grunts as she spins on her foot, sending ger foot toward her dummy, resulting in a large: Crack! as it's wooden frame shattered.

Mulan wipes her sweat-drenched brow with her bare forearm, releasing the stench of her underarm to her nostrils. "Whew! And I think I now how they're going to…" she says with a devilish grin.
12311.title: Mulan

123112.content:
Mulan walks away from her broken training-dummy, her skin slick with sweat, toward the direction of princesses homes.

The three women each have very large homes, their husbands had been rewarded with great wealth after helping China in the way they did. Mulan walks to the end of a road that splits off in three directions. It is quite late, so each of the princesses is likely at her own home preparing for bed.

She turns down the street to:
123112.title: Mulan attempts to catch one princess at a time

choices: Mulan drops on top of Mai, waking her
12311222.content:
Mulan turns down the street to Mai's, and after about five minutes of walking, arrives at her doorstep. Mulan smirks at the barred door, such pathetic locks cannot keep a soldier such as her out. Mulan quickly and quietly lifts the bar holding the door closed, and slips inside.

It is dark inside, smoke billows out of recently-extinguished candles; Mai recently went to bed. Mulan slinks into Mai's room to find her peacefully sleeping, "Heh. That's going to change." She mutters under her breath.

Mulan slides her shirt off of her, now dry, chest. Allowing her breasts to be kissed by a cool breeze from Mai's open window. Her pants quickly follow into a pile on the floor as she climbs onto Mai's bed, holding her anus about a half-foot about Mai's nose. Waiting a moment before dropping her smelling hole onto Mai.

12321.title: Adventure Time?

choices: Princess Bubblegum makes herself stink too, with SCIENCE!
Bubblegum finds someone else to fight Marceline in a stink-off
123211.content:
Princess Bubblegum awoke on what she thought was an average day to find that she had an unusual amount of pressure on her chest. She tried to move but couldn't get up, roll over or even move her arms. At first she wasn't too worried, but that was from being half-awake. When the realization hit her, she freaked out and tried to get up, only to find that she was still stuck. Her eyes snapped open and she saw that her vision was completely obscured by... denim?

"Wakey Wakey Bubbles!"

Bubblegum recognized that voice, "Marceline?"

The Vampire Queen answered not with her voice, but with her butt. FRRRRRPPPT blew out from the crack of her denim jeans and poured into Bubblegum's face, assaulting her with the stink of rotten eggs and decaying fish. Unfortunately for PB, her mouth was open and she got her tongue coated in vampire farts. She choked, coughed and sputtered while Marceline laughed. She jumped off her friend and hovered a few feet above her bed, laughing like a madwoman.

"What the hell Marceline?" PB held her throat while she tried to get the awful taste off her tongue.

"Wasn't that super raunchy?" Marcy said, smiling like a goof.

"Yes! Awful!"

"It's so cool!" Marceline said, "I got cursed by a bog witch last night for playing my Bass too loud while she was sleeping. She gave me the Hex of Horrible Odors, my BO, farts and belches can kill small animals now! Here, smell my armpits!"

PB tried to yell "no!" but Marceline was too fast for her, she got a face (and mouth!) full of salty stenchy vampire sweat. She gagged and tried to struggle free but the smell sapped her strength. She could only lay there until Marceline decided that she had tortured her enough.

"Yeah, it's super cool" she said, still amazed by her stench, "She said that until I was defeated by someone smellier than me, my odor would have no end! And after smelling myself for a while I'm pretty sure that NOBODY can stink worse than me. Like, get a whiff of THIS."

Marceline went to pull off one of her boots, and PB cried out in terror but it was too late. The boot came off with a sickening "Squealch!" and her disgusting, dripping foot coated the entire room in the smell of cheesy cornchips. PB was so repulsed that she jumped out of her bed and vomited out the window.

"Jeez PB, quit being a baby. It's just a foot smell" Marceline snickered

"Go AWAY!" PB shouted, "Before I choke to death on your stink!"

"Well if it's so bad why don't you cure me, huh? Find someone to stink worse than me and it'll stop."

"Hmmm..."
123211.title: Marceline's Stenchy Surprise

choices: Princess Bubblegum goes and fights Marceline with her stench!
Princess Bubblegum is addicted to being smelly, she joins Marcy in torturing
1232111.content:
"Hey you gotta check out these skidmarks on my-" Marceline was just pulling down her pants to show Bubblegum glob-knows-what, but PB was already running for her life (and her nose). Marcy tried to follow, but PB had disappeared into the many corridors and hallways of her castle. She COULD chase, but if there was anything Marceline was, it was lazy. Instead of following, she sat down on Bubblegum's pillow, pulled her bass out of nowhere and started playing and farting up a storm while she waited for the princess to return.

PB had run all the way into her lab and locked the door behind her. If there was any way she was going to out-stink Marceline, then she had to do it with science! In a far off corner of her secret sanctum of scientific study, Bubblegum had kept a machine she called the "Befouler". It was a machine that she had accidentally created while working on a teleporter; instead of teleporting folks it instead made them incredibly noxious, smelly and foul. On top of that, it made them CONTAGIOUS, so that anything a "befouled" object came in contact with became horrendously smelly. She almost never used it unless she wanted to make some fancy cheese, but this was the perfect opportunity to do some good with it.

Princess Bubblegum had already devised a plan: she used a tiny squeegee to get some sweat out of her armpit and feet from the run and placed it in a jar. She the hocked a loogie in a second small jar. Then, and finally, she put another jar over her butt and cut a petite fart that, while smelly, was nothing compared to Marceline's. PB placed the jars in the the Befouler Machine's glass chamber and switched it on. In a flash of green light and the sound of a broken tuba. When the light was gone, the jars of sweat, spit and fart were now filled with a greasy slime, a yellowish green liquid and a foggy gas, respectively.

Holding her breath, Bubblegum slathered the sweat grease all over her body. In response, her gum body turned a muddy brown and began to stink horribly. 125121.content:
The suprising outcome of the 74th annual Hunger Games success has been made known far and wide. The unlikely duo emerged victorious, trifling over many adversaries - as well as making some new powerful enemies.

Whilst the whole of Panem revelled in the closing of the annual games, the powerful head of state plotted with his other higher-ups. A plan to squash this cute resistance must be thought up quick.

And thought up quick it was.

The quarter quell special mix-up was announced soon before the 75th Hunger Games the net year:
The tributes are to be only female. Two from each district - and past winners are not safe from the reaping.

Of course the one girl the powerful figures wanted in the games could be cheated into being reaped easily - but who shall take the second place for district twelve?
125121.title: May the odds fall not upon you!

info.brief_description: Girls battling it out using their feet, armpits, and anything that gets smelly and sweaty!
info.description:
I've been browsing this site for a while, waiting for just the right story, you know the one, the perfect Interactive to cover your niche. I finally decided to cut the gordian knot, and make it myself. Anyways, Here's how its gonna go down:

This story is going to be split, right from the beginning, into two branches. The first branch, will be a tournament-y style fighting arena for OC characters to get down and dirty and all sweaty (and make the losers lick them clean). The battles will break down like this: Two characters enter, one girl loses either by knock out from a really bad smell or grossed into submission, in which case the winner gets to enact a humiliating forfeit, which can be sexual, but remember to keep the gross stuff the focus. ALL THINGS ARE ALLOWED including scat and vore. But the Vore must be soft and has to end with the vore-e being vomited up or shitted out, because hey. there's some smelly torture right there.

The other branch is for more one-offy stories, using characters from Anime, Comic Books, Cartoons, Movies, etc. These are for those times where you just wanted to see Chun-li kick the shit out of Cammy, and then force her to lick her pits clean, Or Katara sweatbending straight into Azula's mouth. This is more like the standard stories, you know, probably with the long lists of choices of medias and things like that

Anyways, I'm hoping this story will get big-ish who knows, maybe i'll even get YOU to contribute.
